about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled rampage through waves of relentless enemies. Plunge headfirst into a dystopian world overrun by ruthless enemies hell-bent on your destruction. As the last hope for humanity, it's up to you to unleash unparalleled fury upon the hordes that stand in your way.

Armed to the teeth with an arsenal of high-tech weaponry, you'll dive into the fray with guns blazing and blades gleaming. From futuristic assault rifles to devastating plasma cannons, each weapon in your arsenal is meticulously crafted to wreak havoc on your adversaries. But brute force alone won't save you in this relentless onslaught. Quick reflexes, strategic thinking, and split-second decision-making are the keys to survival.

As you mow down waves of enemies with unmatched precision, the intensity only escalates. Explosions rock the battlefield as you unleash devastating special attacks, wiping out entire legions in a blaze of glory. But beware, for the enemy grows stronger with each passing moment, adapting to your tactics and throwing ever more formidable challenges your way.

But fear not, for you are no ordinary warrior. As you progress, unlock powerful upgrades and enhancements that push the boundaries of human capability. From cybernetic enhancements that grant lightning-fast reflexes to experimental nanotech that turns your enemies' weapons against them, the odds may be stacked against you, but with the right tools, victory is within reach.

Immerse yourself in stunning, immersive environments that pulse with life and danger around every corner. From the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk metropolis to the scorched ruins of a post-apocalyptic wasteland, each level offers a unique and exhilarating challenge.

So, steel yourself for the ultimate test of skill, speed, and survival. Can you rise above the chaos and become the apex predator in a world gone mad? The fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and only the most fearless and ferocious warriors will emerge victorious in "Black Sails"!

Key Features:

Galatic Warfare: Engage in pulse-pounding battles against waves of galactic enemies that increase in number and difficulty with each successive onslaught. Stay on your toes as new enemy types and formidable boss encounters challenge your adaptability and combat prowess.


Undead Warfare: Engage in pulse-pounding battles against waves of Undead enemies that increase in number and difficulty with each successive onslaught. Stay on your toes as new enemy types and formidable boss encounters challenge your adaptability and combat prowess.


Epic Boss Battles: Confront towering bosses that serve as ultimate tests of skill and determination. Each boss encounter presents its own set of challenges and requires careful observation, quick reflexes, and precise timing to overcome.

Rewarding Progression: Earn experience points and loot for each enemy defeated, allowing you to unlock powerful upgrades, customizable abilities, and new weapons to further enhance your combat capabilities. Tailor your playstyle to suit your preferences and dominate the battlefield like never before.

Dynamic Environments: Fight across dynamically changing environments filled with obstacles, cover opportunities, and interactive elements that can be used to your advantage or exploited by your enemies. From claustrophobic corridors to sprawling open arenas, adapt to your surroundings to gain the upper hand in combat.

Leaderboards and Challenges: Climb the global leaderboards and take on special challenges to prove your mastery of combat. Compete against friends and players from around the world for the ultimate recognition as the most fearsome warrior in the game.



Get ready to set sail among the stars, plunder the cosmos, and become the most feared space pirate in "Black Sails." The galaxy awaits your command, Captain!

content_descriptors.notes: Black Sails includes mature content wit strategic decision-making which may involve violent encounters. While the game provides an immersive experience, discretion is advised for younger audiences. Players should be aware of dynamic sci-fi combat and violence within the context of a space buccaneer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for multiplayer. SSD required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for multiplayer. SSD required.
